items.item_description: The Sea-whale HL is a floating crane installation for performing complex off-shore lifting operations. The crane is designed to withstend extreme loads and to balance itself even with relatively strong waves.
Extremely performant long-beam offshore platform-crane capable of lifting HTR and THR loads. Installed with the most advanced techniques in order to save time and to optimize the performances.
